OOC: I didn't start it, but I always finish it in a very violent way, and f=
or that I am not sorry, it is my way and I stick to it. Hey, I'd have knock=
ed his ass out if I could. Nobody belittles my opinions without backlash. I=
t is merely fact.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: EmprzAnastazia@a=
ol.com 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, June 12, 2003 11:09=
 PM
  Subject: Re: Majorly great news!


  ALRIGHT! Enough of this attitude=
, might I state it is rather rude! 

  The idea of a movie, is rather high =
I think. Some I have heard of in the past have been nothing but rumors, lit=
tle have I seen it as an official statement by Hasbro. & with the boom of T=
ransformers & their major popularity, & those in charge of the movie projec=
t, I state it as a high probability. As this has been a topic for a while o=
n some of the Transformers Forums & possibly at the BotCons. Supply & deman=
d. 

  Opinions are & will be voiced. If you don't agree with them, then do=
n't shoot down someone for it. Let alone the use of name calling & foul lan=
guage. It's bad sportsmanship. 

  Stac


  In a message dated 6/12/03 8:48=
:14 PM Central Daylight Time, hollywood.narrator@... writes:



   =
 OOC: Tankor is a dick no matter what he says.

    And I don't give a shit=
 what any of you think about that.



      ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
     From: Tankor 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, =
June 12, 2003 8:06 PM
      Subject: Re: Majorly great news!


      this i=
s great news no matter what hollywood says

      Hollywood Narrator <holly=
wood.narrator@...> wrote: 

        OOC: This mail is going to seem=
 VERY angry. All of my mails do anyway, please remember.

        I honestl=
y don't understand why this is great news. Whenever they announce stuff lik=
e this, I just become worried. VERY worried. What happens if it sucks? I'll=
 be VERY mad indeed. I think it'll be great news when the movie is out and =
DOESN'T suck. I'm honestly more excited about their next line of Transforme=
rs for 2004, their 20th anniversary line entitled Transformers Energon. I K=
NOW their toys will always be good. In case you don't understand where I'm =
coming from, I thought Beast Wars was a good show. It pailed in comparison =
to the original Transformers, but it was good. However, it could have been =
SO much better as just an ordinary cartoon like the original Transformers i=
nstead of computer generation. So the idea behind a live action movie makes=
 me think things like "who's writing it? What's the budget? Will Hasbro wat=
ch over it? Will they make it as bad an adaptation as The Running Man?" I k=
now you're all thinking that I should be more optimistic, but you've seen h=
ow characters can be completely warped, as proof of it occurred in Beast Ma=
chines. Forgive the fact that this mail was so long. Also forgive the fact =
that I'm still working on my upcoming storylines.



          ----- Origin=
al Message -----
          From: EmprzAnastazia@...
          To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com
          Sent: Wednesday, June 11, 2003 7:50 PM
        =
  Subject: OOC: Majorly great news!


          Hasbro has made an official=
 press release of a Live Action Transformers movie! Release date TBA. 

   =
       Check out www.hasbro.com for the press release!

          Stac




=








        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 

             
       
       

  Yo=
ur use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
